div.bibl: SALONIKI, June 12, 1926PICNIC BY THE SOCIETY OF "ST. HELEN"

body.p: The philanthropic society of Greek ladies St. Helen gives its First Annual Picnic, Sunday, June 20th, at Frank Diesing's Place. All the Greeks of Chicago are invited to participate. The proceeds of the picnic will be utilized for aiding needy Greek families of Chicago.
We hope to make this coming picnic a success, for its object is humanitarian, and no one will fail to assist.
